productName: Mibro Lite Smart Watch Global Version - Black
details: The new smartwatch comes with a 1.3-inch AMOLED HD screen, which brings the world of colors (Rich and clear colors). If you are one wondering why the AMOLED screen is best from the TFT screen? Then you must know that the AMOLED screen is clearer and more energy-efficient. Also, the AMOLED screen stays clear under strong light and at night.
